title: Art and Picture Book Activity: Tall Figure
copy: Strike a pose! Explore movement and create your very own sculpture inspired by the work of Alberto Giacometti. Enjoy the read aloud link to make connections between this artwork and the book, “From Head to Toe” by Eric Carle. Designed especially for young learners, this resource offers creative ideas for looking at and responding to art together.   Illinois Early Learning Standards: Learning Standard 2.D Establish personal connection with books. Learning Standard 12.A.ECa Observe, investigate, describe, and categorize living things. Learning Standard 25.A.ECa Build awareness of, explore, and participate in dance and creative movement activities.
